snippet: The training ensemble of Dance Theater of Harlem, performing at the Joyce, swerves from classic charm to contemporary twitchiness.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews performance by Dance Theater of Harlem II at the Joyce Theater.
lead_paragraph: The training ensemble of Dance Theater of Harlem, performing at the Joyce, swerves from classic charm to contemporary twitchiness.
